name: Escape Voxel World
description:
Puzzle Platformer minimalstic game.

The goal of this game is very simple:

  • Collect the keys to unlock the lock
  • Avoid getting caught by the enemy
  • Move onto the unlocked cube to go to the next level

Controls:

  • For camera movement use A / D or Left Arrow / Right Arrow
  • Click on white circles to move in that direction

This is our first game we've made and it was made for the Minimalistic Jam 3.

The Music used in the game was made by Game_assets_66 and Clemens H. a.k.a. "sauer2"!
